email_text:
Subject: Urgent Payment Request for Overdue Invoice

Dear [Recipient],

I hope this email finds you well. I am writing to follow up on the outstanding invoice #123456 that was due for payment on [Due Date]. It appears that the payment has not been received yet, and I wanted to bring this to your attention as it is now overdue.

As a small vendor, cash flow is crucial for the sustainability of our business, and timely payments from our clients are essential to ensure that we can continue to provide you with the high-quality products and services that you have come to rely on.

I kindly request that you prioritize this payment and settle the outstanding amount as soon as possible. Please find attached a copy of the invoice for your reference.

If there are any issues or concerns regarding this payment, please do not hesitate to reach out to me so that we can resolve this matter promptly.

Thank you in advance for your attention to this matter. I appreciate your cooperation and understanding.

Warm regards,

[Vendor Name]
